reviews.review_msg: Rebecca lacks communication skills, and her lessons are long and boring. AVOID.

The only graded materials were two exams, an essay, and tut participation, making one bad grade difficult to recover from. Your TA marks your work and mine was a very tough grader and not clear with the guidelines for full marks. But tutorials were helpful in understanding the material, and the lecture gave the basics but it was not as in-depth.

Rebecca was quite boring in my opinion, and I felt that the content evaluated on the midterm and final did not accurately reflect my understanding of the course. The evaluations were graded rather tough for my section, and I felt that her quality of teaching was below standard.

This course is difficult and boring. I am not kidding you! Fortunately, Rebecca is so sweet and caring. She supported me when I felt overwhelmed and stressed. I thought I would get a F at the beginning but I started to be confident over time. Finally I got a C! I am not good at Sociology but I am still pleased with the outcome. Thank you Rebecca!
Good! very standard prof, clear expectations and tests/assignments are straight forward.
Best prof I had so far. Dr. Lennox is such a kind person and very patient as well. Her teachings are clear and very thorough. Really recommend her
